Package org.italiangrid.voms.credential.impl

Class Summary
AbstractLoadCredentialsStrategy Base class for load credentials strategy providing utility classes for loading credentials from the filesystem and notifying the results of load operations to interested listeners (via LoadCredentialsEventListener).
DefaultLoadCredentialsStrategy The default strategy used to load user credentials when no file is explicitly pointed out by the user of this API.
DefaultProxyPathBuilder  
VOMSPEMCredential This class leverages BouncyCastle support for password finders to route around canl PEMCredential limitations which hide such support.
